alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 01 at 12:35PM AKDT until June 02 at 9:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKDT THURSDAY FOR HIGH FIRE DANGER... The National Weather Service in Juneau has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 9 PM AKDT Thursday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 019. * WIND...Up to 15 mph * HUMIDITY...As low as 14 percent with temperatures in the mid 70s Wednesday and mid 80s on Thursday. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A warning means that severe fire weather conditions are already occurring or imminent in the warning area. Temperatures will cool overnight and relative humidity values will recover, but confidence is high that red flag conditions will return by mid day Thursday. These conditions may persist through the end of the work week and an extension to this red flag warning may become necessary. Please advise the appropriate officials and fire crews in the field of this red flag warning. This statement will be updated by 8:30 PM AKDT Wednesday or sooner if conditions warrant.
